-e ---

# vizier 𓁹
𓌵 𓁹
𓌻 𓂋 𓏏 𓏮 𓁹 𓁹 | eyes | mirati

Mayor Mark

ܡܪܝܐ māryā "Lord" ≈ Mark ≈ malik king

𓅓 𓂋 | overseer | mayor major mayer მმართველი mmartveli ⇔ admire mire miracle 𓁹 𓌵

𜎦𜒇𜑊𜏳 Menir “king” ⇔ 𓋊 Min
𜎦𜑊𜐶 ᵏMenik malik König “king” ( 𓋊 Menes 𓋉 Khmin 𓃝 Khmun )

𓅖 𓐍 𓈖 | manager/master of the King | Mer.King Makron? Mark > Malik = King @ crown

𓅖 𓂋 𓏤 𓇋 𓇋 𓈖 𓄿 | Mariannu | ‘Mariyanar’ (charioteers) 'syrische' Krieger-Kaste

𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 | lion | Mai 𓄂 mayor ⇔ 𓏇 𓇋 𓅱 𓃠

𒈛 𒈤 SUKKAL MAḪ, 𓎟 maḫa, exalted vizier

𒈤 = 𓄂 in 𒈤𒊑 maḫ-ri 𓅓 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 "before" im Vorsitz ⇔ mayor 𓅓 𓂋

𒌑𒈠𒄭𒅕 u2-ma-hi-ir a'mayor "command"
